Name: A way up!
About the game: A way up! is a simple platformer about throwing a rock. A story about a meteorite separated from his fellow space stones. Can be painful, relaxing, annoying, satisfying. Someone will say it is easy, someone else it is impossible. Depends on you. Play how you want - slowly, quickly, chaotically or strategically. Play as a meteorite to help it get back to space Venture vertiacally from magma caves through city up to high skies Simple, dynamic controls - hold a mouse button over a meteorite and throw it About 2 hours of gameplay depending (can take much longer) Intense, engaging sometimes frustrating, yet satisfying Try to get the best time
